ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_mulgcddvds | |- ( ( K e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( K gcd ( M x. N ) ) || ( ( K gcd M ) x. ( K gcd N ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( ( K gcd M ) = 1 /\ ( K gcd N ) = 1 ) -> ( ( K gcd M ) x. ( K gcd N ) ) = ( 1 x. 1 ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_1t1e1 | |- ( 1 x. 1 ) = 1 |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( ( ( K gcd M ) = 1 /\ ( K gcd N ) = 1 ) -> ( ( K gcd M ) x. ( K gcd N ) ) = 1 ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_breq2d | |- ( ( ( K gcd M ) = 1 /\ ( K gcd N ) = 1 ) -> ( ( K gcd ( M x. N ) ) || ( ( K gcd M ) x. ( K gcd N ) ) <-> ( K gcd ( M x. N ) ) || 1 ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_syl5ibcom | |- ( ( K e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( K gcd M ) = 1 /\ ( K gcd N ) = 1 ) -> ( K gcd ( M x. N ) ) || 1 ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( K e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> K e. ZZ ) |
| 8 |  | #P_zmulcl | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M x. N ) e. ZZ ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( K e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M x. N ) e. ZZ ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_gcdcld | |- ( ( K e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( K gcd ( M x. N ) ) e. NN0 ) |
| 11 |  | #P_dvds1 | |- ( ( K gcd ( M x. N ) ) e. NN0 -> ( ( K gcd ( M x. N ) ) || 1 <-> ( K gcd ( M x. N ) ) = 1 ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ( K e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( K gcd ( M x. N ) ) || 1 <-> ( K gcd ( M x. N ) ) = 1 ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_sylibd | |- ( ( K e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( K gcd M ) = 1 /\ ( K gcd N ) = 1 ) -> ( K gcd ( M x. N ) ) = 1 ) ) |
